item.title: PATH
item.description: score:-7 Chances: UiPath’s alliance expansion with Deloitte to accelerate the transformation of their clients’ businesses through AI-powered Intelligent Automation solutions is a promising development. The addition of Pradeep Kumar as Senior Vice President of Services and Customer Success indicates UiPath’s commitment to enhancing its customer experience.
